title: Updating the UE-requested ProSeP policy provisioning procedure for multi-hop
reason_for_change:
Within the scope of Rel-19 work related to 5G_ProSe_Ph3, SA2 has agreed
in S2-2409085 on the new Policy/Parameters provisioning for different 5G
ProSe multi-hop communications.
In order to support the provisioning of the policy/parameters to the UE, the
UE-requested ProSeP policy provisioning procedure needs to be updated to
allow communicating the UE policies from the PCF to the UE. This CR
introduces the needed updates.
summary_of_change:
Updating the UE-requested ProSeP policy provisioning procedure to
accommodate for multi-hop communications.
